  • Method Details

    • cardType

      public CommonGoalCard cardType()
      Method cardType is used to sort the cards into their respective types. The method uses the card ID to find its respective CardType from the json file. Then it initializes the card and returns it.
      Returns:
      CommonGoalCard - the card of the respective type.

    • getDiffUpTo

      public int getDiffUpTo()
      overridden method getDiffUpTo returns the max number of different tile types.
      Returns:
      int - e.g.The maximum number of different tile types that a column/row can have so that it counts towards the card requirements.

    • getHorizontal

      overridden method getHorizontal.
      Returns:
      int- 1 if the card requires rows to satisfy the card requirements, 0 otherwise.
